name: MULTIVERSE CAPTAIN COLD
summary: Sub-Boss Multiverse Captain Cold disables opponent's Special 1. You can break his Combo only with your Specials

abilities.CONTINUITY: Opponents Combo Meter breaks by specific attacks only.
abilities.ABILITIES DISABLED: Player's team have one or more of their Abilities disabled.

name: TELEKINETIC GORILLA GRODD
summary: Sub-Boss Telekinetic Gorilla Grodd applies DoT on stunned opponents from his Special. He also has Armour Pierce immunity.

abilities.NO MERCY: When stunned, any additional stun attacks by opponents apply damage over time.
abilities.IMPENETRABLE: Player basic, swipe and tag attacks with Armour Pierce do not bypass defense of opponents.

name: UNHINGED HARLEY QUINN
summary: Sub-Boss Harley Quinn deals increased damage based on the fullness of her Power Bar. She is also immune to Power Drain.

abilities.BESERK: Each filled segment of the opponent's Power Bar increases the damage they deal.
abilities.INSULATED: Opponents do not lose power when under the influence od a power drain effect.

name: CHEETAH
summary: Sub-Boss Cheetah deals increased damage over time and applies DoT on her Specials.

abilities.POISON: Opponents deal increased damage over time.
abilities.BLEED: Opponent's Abilities also cause damage over time.

name: DEADSHOT
summary: Boss Suicide Squad Deadshot deals extra damage for missing Health of opponent. He has increased Critical Attack chance and also is immune to Power Drain.

abilities.FOCUSED: Opponents have increased critical attack chance.
abilities.INSULATED: Opponents do not lose power when under the influence of a power drain effect.
